text: The Revere Journal is the local newspaper for Revere, Massachusetts. It was founded in 1881 with E. H. Pierce as editor, and originally was published as an eight-page publication on Saturdays, with an initial circulation of 2,500. It is currently published online at reverejournal.com. ==References== Category:Newspapers published in Massachusetts Category:Revere, Massachusetts Category:Publications established in 1881
title: Revere Journal
